text: Meg White (born December 10, 1974) is an American former musician and singer. She is known as the drummer for The White Stripes. Meg's simple style of drumming has caused a lot of debate. Meg called it "my strength. A lot of drummers would feel weird about being that simplistic." title: Meg White
